CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AstraCorp relative to Lumina Solutions?
SRP.A: AstraCorp is {below} Lumina Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Enterprises relative to Lumina Solutions?
SRP.A: Zenith Enterprises is {below} Lumina Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Lumina Solutions relative to AstraCorp?
SRP.A: Lumina Solutions is {above} AstraCorp in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cost per hire?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Lumina Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cost per hire?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Enterprises}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Lumina Solutions's minimum Cost per Hire in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Lumina Solutions's minimum Cost per Hire is in {1950}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Enterprises's maximum Cost per Hire in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Enterprises's maximum Cost per Hire is in {1950}.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1968, was the average total Cost per Hire higher or lower than between 1951 and 1968?
NC.A: The average total cost per hire between 1952 and 1968 was {higher} than between 1951 and 1968.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1965, was the average total Cost per Hire higher or lower than between 1951 and 1952?
NC.A: The average total cost per hire between 1958 and 1965 was {higher} than between 1951 and 1952.

NC.Q: Was the total Cost per Hire in 1956 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total cost per hire in 1956 was {lower} than in 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1958, did the total Cost per Hire experience a larger or smaller change than between 1956 and 1965?
NC.A: The change in total cost per hire between 1952 and 1958 was {smaller} than between 1956 and 1965.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Lumina Solutions} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did AstraCorp and Lumina Solutions first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: AstraCorp and Lumina Solutions did not exchange leading positions.
